mapper.select: SELECT loan_pmt_due_date FROM t_apass_repay_schedule WHERE loan_init_term = '1' AND loan_id =#{value}

SELECT SCHEDULE_ID AS scheduleId, USER_ID AS userId, LOAN_ID AS loanId, LOAN_INIT_PRIN AS loanInitPrin, LOAN_INIT_TERM AS loanInitTerm, CURR_TERM AS currTerm, LOAN_TERM_PRIN AS loanTermPrin, LOAN_TERM_INT AS loanTermInt, LOAN_TERM_FEE AS loanTermfee, LOAN_SVC_FEE AS loanSvcFee, loan_assure_fee AS loanAssureFee, loan_formalities_fee AS loanFormalitiesFee, loan_plat_fee AS loanPlatFee, LOAN_INTEREST_AMT AS loanInterestAmt, LOAN_PMT_DUE_DATE AS loanPmtDueDate, STMT_FLAG AS stmtFlag, CREATE_USER AS createUser, CREATE_DATE AS createDate, UPDATE_USER AS updateUser, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate, LOAN_STATUS AS loanStatus FROM T_APASS_REPAY_SCHEDULE
ORDER BY loan_pmt_due_date DESC,CURR_TERM DESC
